B

BattleshipPlayPanel - Class in <Unnamed>
 
BattleshipPlayPanel() - Constructor for class BattleshipPlayPanel
This is the constructor of the play panel.
blnGameOver - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
True if the game is over
blnHit - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
True if you have hit your opponent's ship.
blnHorizontal - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
This is true if the ships are rotated horizontally.
blnPlayAnimation - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
blnPlayAnimation[1] represents the bomb animation blnPlayAnimation[2] represents the explosion animation blnPlayAnimation[3] represents the splash animation blnPlayAnimation[i] = true means that the i-th animation is currently playing
blnPlayingAnimation - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
True if an animation is currently playing.
blnStartGame - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
True if the game has started (both players have pressed ready).
blnYourTurn - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
True if it is your turn to fire.

I

intAnimationCol - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
The column which the bomb/explosion/splash animation should be played
intAnimationRow - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
The row which the bomb/explosion/splash animation should be played
intAnimCount - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
The sprite which the animation is currently displaying
intDefaultPositionsH - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
Stores the default click area for each battleship when they are horizontal and haven't been placed on the map yet For ex, top left coordinate is (intDefaultPositionsV[][0], inintDefaultPositionsV[][1]), bottom right coordinate is (intDefaultPositionsV[][2], intDefaultPositionsV[][3])
intDefaultPositionsV - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
Stores the default click area for each battleship when they are vertical and haven't been placed on the map yet For ex, top left coordinate is (intDefaultPositionsV[][0], inintDefaultPositionsV[][1]), bottom right coordinate is (intDefaultPositionsV[][2], intDefaultPositionsV[][3])
intHealth - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
Your HP.
intMaxAnimationSprites - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
Represents the maximum number of sprites/frames that each animation has intMaxAnimationSprites[1] reprents the bomb animation intMaxAnimationSprites[2] reprents the explosion animation intMaxAnimationSprites[3] reprents the splash animation
intOpponentGrid - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
Stores the grid representing your guesses of your opponent's ships 11 - Ship 1 has been sunk and it is vertical 12 - Ship 1 has been sunk and it is horizontal 21 - Ship 2 has been sunk and it is vertical 22 - Ship 2 has been sunk and it is horizontal 31 - Ship 3 has been sunk and it is vertical 32 - Ship 3 has been sunk and it is horizontal 41 - Ship 4 has been sunk and it is vertical 42 - Ship 4 has been sunk and it is horizontal 51 - Ship 5 has been sunk and it is vertical 52 - Ship 5 has been sunk and it is horizontal 1 - A ship has been hit (may not be sunk yet) 2 - Your guess is a miss
intPlaced - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
Determines the status of the ship (whether it has been placed for not) 0 - Not Placed, 1 - Placed Vertically, 2 - Placed Horizontally
intPositions - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
Stores the location that each of YOUR battleships should be drawn to the screen The coordinate of the battleship is (intPositions[][0], intPositions[][1])
intShipHits - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
Represents the number of times each ship has been hit
intShipSelected - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
Represents the ship you have selected when you are dragging and dropping the ships onto the map
intShipsSunk - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
Represents the number of YOUR ships that have been sunk
intSizes - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
Stores the size of each ship For ex, the size of ship 1 is intSizes[1]
intSunkCol - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
The column that the currently sunk ship is located at
intSunkRow - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
The row that the currently sunk ship is located at
intSunkValue - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
Used to update the value of intOpponentGrid[][]
intTheme - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
The current theme that is selected 0 - Battleship 1 - Ducky 2 - Lego 3 - User Created Theme
intThemetotal - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
The total number of themes currently available
intWinLose - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
1 means that you have won, 2 means that you lost
intYourGrid - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
Stores the grid representing your map of battleships (the minimap) -1 represents that your opponent has missed 10, 20, 30, 40, 50 represents that your ships 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 has been hit, respectively

P

paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class BattleshipPlayPanel
Repaints the play panel so that the gameplay visuals are updated.

S

strLetters - Variable in class BattleshipPlayPanel
Stores the letters which correspond to each column on the grid.
